name: FRAME by FRAME (Datal0re)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.

Use the Space key to jump. Input lag is now strategy.

I tried to really take the theme of "only one" to heart. This game has only one:

  • Screen
  • Button
  • Life
  • Frame per second
  • Audio file
  • Spawn pattern
  • (and the player and obstacles are the number one, but that was just for fun!)

I hope you enjoy my first ever submission to a game jam!

...I guess that's another "only one". Oh well.
